title: Free Agent WR/TE Rankings, Impact of Coronavirus on NFL Calendar (Football 3/11)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Jonathan Jones as Free Agency Preview Week continues. The guys first analyze the impact coronavirus could have on the NFL offseason (1:00), before hitting on the franchise tag deadline getting moved back yet again (8:00). Next, the NFLPA has a new president, what does it mean for the CBA vote (17:00)? Will and JJ hit on a few more news items including the Cowboys and Steelers being announced for the Hall of Fame game and Marshall Yanda retiring from the NFL. Then, the definitive free agency rankings and best fits for wide receivers (30:15) and tight ends that will soon hit the market (44:15).

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @jjones9
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy

itunes:subtitle: What are the best landing spots for the top free agent wide receivers and tight ends? Will Brinson and Jonathan Jones break down the market.
